home.title:
Welcome to XCJ Games

To see the complete message press 'enter'
Type the 'help' command to see more information in the bottom bar
Escriba 'help' para cambiar el idioma

help.title:
Help

These are the commands available on XCJ Games
home: Home
about: General information
education: Information on education and training 
portfolio: Information on professional and personal projects
current: XCJ Games ongoing projects and training
name: The new text must be written after the 'name' command after a space and must be less than 20 characters
spanish: Change the language to Spanish
english: Change the language to English
mia: Meet the developer who has made this website

about.title:
About me

I'm Carlos Jiménez
I'm a Gameplay Programmer with strong skills in C++, C#, Unity, Godot and Software architecture. I've developed and published several indie minigames and prototypes on my own as well as collaborating with artists, designers and other programmers
I've been playing videogames almost everyday since I was able to grab a controller, which has given me a lot of experience about the mechanics and designs of lots of genres. I'm also a usual pen 'n paper player and game master, as well as a long fan of card and board games
My background working with web technologies helped me develop my coding and interpersonal skills, collaborating with different departments and clients

Contact
To contact there are the following commands
email: An email will be sent
linkedin: It will be redirected to Linkedin
twitter: It will be redirected to Twitter
github: It will be redirected to GitHub

metal.title:
Metal Slug

Metal Slug clone made with web technologies and Quintus.js
Insert the following command for more information about this project
metal web: Play this game

planet.title:
Planet Born

Create your own planet mixing different types of asteroids while avoiding impacts! Submission for the JamOn 2021
Insert the following command for more information about this project
planet web: Play this game

treeventure.title:
Treeventure

Christmas tree farm simulator, with an ecological and scary twist!
Insert the following command for more information about this project
treeventure web: Play this game

damng.title:
Damng!: The Captain's Ballad

Tactical turn-based game inspired by games like XCOM or Battle Brothers. Help a band of scoundrels get revenge for the death of their former captain. Submission for the Spain Game Devs Jam II
Insert the following command for more information about this project
damng web: Play this game

dielucard.title:
The Grand Escape of Dielucard

2D platformer where you control Dielucard, a Dhampir Warrior, and help him escape a dungeon
Insert the following command for more information about this project
dielucard web: Play this game

fire.title:
Line of Fire: Strategic Defense

Plants vs Zombies clone with a sci-fi / dystopian style
Insert the following command for more information about this project
fire web: Play this game
fire play: Play this game on the Play Store

oriadris.title:
Dragon Attack: Skies of Oriadris

Get the higher score you can achieve in this top-down arcade shooter
oriadris play: Play this game on the Play Store
